resources.string: Hold the button on your FIND-E
To start pairing, put your smartphone near FIND-E and hold the button.
Pairing with your smartphone
It can take several seconds to establish the connection.
Connecting FIND-E \nto your smartphone
It can take several seconds\n to estabish the connection.
Pairing complited
We’re good to go!
You can use FIND-E with whatever you want,\n just attach it to things you don\'t want to lose.
How to use FIND-E?
Just attach it to things you don’t want to lose.
OK, LET\'S START
Turn on location to find devices nearby you
Turn on bluetooth to continue processing
Turn on
We cannot recognize any devices near by you. Please, press button on tag and try once more.
Retry
Cancel
Unable to continue without device, press \'Close\' to finish
CLOSE
